name: In My Head (DarekDev)
description:
Description:

"Inside My Head" is a short Game about a child named July who's coping with the Death of her Mother while she's looking for her Mom's Spirit inside her dream. The Gameplay consists of avoiding spikes and using double jumping to reach the end to find July's Mom.

Controls:

A - Moving Left

D - Moving Right

Esc - Pause

Space - Jumping/Double Jumping

Note:

If you find any bugs or have any questions about the games just ask in the comments. And please rate the game after playing.
